Owlhawk did not even try to avoid the punch and was hit by its full
strength. He felt disgusted at himself and at all other Maximals. They
had let IT happen to one of theirs and made Condor's death vain. Why
should he feel anything but dirty this way?

Owlhawk: You are so right, Aerotaur... So right...

He transformed to hawk mode and flew back to the base.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He nods grimly not entirely surprised by the revelation.  A
spark of 
> an idea flashes across his face but is quickly suppressed to keep
Owlhawk 
> from noticing.  He starts growling.  He jumps to his feet in a fury.
 "HOW 
> COULD YOU LET THEM TAKE HER!  BY THE PIT, ONE OF YOUR COMRADES DIED
TRYING TO 
> SAVE HER AND YOU LET THEM KEEP HER?!?"  He growls more loudly this
time and 
> throws one fierce right hook at Owlhawk's head before he transforms
to his 
> bird mode and flies into the night sky.
